item.description:
Music at 9:09PM

A natural on stage, Maureen Benson brings exuberance and joy to every performance. Her repetoire features Duke Ellington, Gershwin, Cole Porter and jazz standards with a healthy dose of blues, latin classics and some R& B favorites for good measure. Her musical influences include Ella Fitzgerald, Sarah Vaughan, Peggy Lee and Carmen McRae, and Bonnie Raitt, to name a few.  Joining her will be, Ric Maure on keys and Mike Ball on upright bass. This trio will provide a fresh  interpretation to the American Song book as well as mixing in some more current music from Bonnie Raitt , Ray Charles,  Van Morrison, and Curtis Mayfield, to name a few.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Last Minute....Dinner and Gershwin at Laurie's 9:09 Steakhouse
